name: V_EHI_PAX_PB_ACCT_TX_GRP_PMT
description: This view filters out premium billing transaction data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium account transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter for the group payment on the transaction.

columns.name: GP_PAY_PAX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the account transaction associated with the group payment.

columns.name: GP_PAY_PLAN_GRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the employer group associated with the payment.

columns.name: GP_PAY_PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record

columns.name: GP_PAY_AMT
columns.description: Amount of the payment towards the employer group

columns.name: GP_PAY_REMAIN_AMT
columns.description: Amount remaining on the transaction for the employer group after payment.
